summary: This is a cover letter email from November 4, 2021, forwarding a document titled '2021-11-03_RTC_and_Verdict_sheet_cover_letter.docx' to an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York. The email asks the recipient to review the attached document.
locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Document is a cover letter email dated November 4, 2021.
Email is addressed to an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
Email attaches a document titled '2021-11-03_RTC_and_Verdict_sheet_cover_letter.docx' for review.
